articles.title: Platform Fighters and Smash-Likes: The Playlist - an IGN Playlist by IGN Playlist Team - IGN
articles.description: When Super Smash Bros. debuted in 1999, it cleverly merged fighting game mechanics with Nintendo's trademark 2D platforming roots. A new sub-genre was born. Here's what games joined the "Games Like Smash Bros." party since then.

articles.author: Brittany Vincent
articles.title: Keep Breathing: Limited Series Review - IGN
articles.description: Keep Breathing is a pedestrian survival drama that's predictable and uninspired from the moment the protagonist’s plane goes down.
articles.content:
Keep Breathing streams on Netflix on July 28, 2022. 
The survival drama is a paint-by-numbers formula. Take a terrified individual or group, drop them into the harsh wilderness, and follow them as t… [+5684 chars]
